meta.goal: User can drink their milk coffee every morning at 7am

controllers.name: WaterLiquidManager
controllers.description: Manages water (liquid state): heat in B2a | Implicit: OverheatProtection[high], WaterQualityProtection[medium]

controllers.name: CoffeeSolidManager
controllers.description: Manages coffee (solid state): grind in B2c | Implicit: FreshnessProtection[low]

controllers.name: CoffeeLiquidManager
controllers.description: Manages coffee (liquid state): brew in B3a

controllers.name: MilkLiquidManager
controllers.description: Manages milk (liquid state): add in B3b | Implicit: FreshnessProtection[high], LineHygieneProtection[high], TemperatureProtection[high]

controllers.name: HMIManager
controllers.description: Manages hmi transactions: output() in B4

controllers.name: SystemControlManager
controllers.description: Manages system control operations: stop() in A3.1

controllers.name: SugarSolidManager
controllers.description: Manages sugar (solid state): add in E1.1 | Implicit: MoistureProtection[medium]

boundaries.name: CoffeeBeansSupplyBoundary
boundaries.description: Boundary for CoffeeBeans supply monitoring and alerts

boundaries.name: CoffeeSupplyBoundary
boundaries.description: Boundary for Coffee supply monitoring and alerts

boundaries.name: WaterSupplyBoundary
boundaries.description: Boundary for Water supply monitoring and alerts

boundaries.name: MilkSupplyBoundary
boundaries.description: Boundary for Milk supply monitoring and alerts

boundaries.name: SugarSupplyBoundary
boundaries.description: Boundary for Sugar supply monitoring and alerts

boundaries.name: TimingBoundary
boundaries.description: Boundary for time-based system scheduling and triggers

boundaries.name: MessageDisplayBoundary
boundaries.description: Boundary for displaying messages to user

boundaries.name: ProductDeliveryBoundary
boundaries.description: Boundary for delivering products to user

control_flow_nodes.name: P2_START
control_flow_nodes.description: Distribution node for parallel flow P2

control_flow_nodes.name: P2_END
control_flow_nodes.description: Merge node for parallel flow P2

control_flow_nodes.name: P3_START
control_flow_nodes.description: Distribution node for parallel flow P3

control_flow_nodes.name: P3_END
control_flow_nodes.description: Merge node for parallel flow P3

control_flows.description: Flow between parallel nodes P2_END -> P3_START
Actor User signals TimingBoundary
Flow from parallel P2_START to B2a
Flow from B2a to parallel P2_END
Flow from parallel P2_START to B2b
Flow from B2b to parallel P2_END
Flow from parallel P2_START to B2c
Flow from B2c to parallel P2_END
Flow from parallel P2_START to B2d
Flow from B2d to parallel P2_END
Flow from parallel P3_START to B3a
Flow from B3a to parallel P3_END
Flow from parallel P3_START to B3b
Flow from B3b to parallel P3_END
Flow from parallel P3_END to B4
Sequential flow from B4 to B5
Actor User interacts with MessageDisplayBoundary
User interaction MessageDisplayBoundary (B4) processed by HMIManager
Actor User interacts with ProductDeliveryBoundary
User interaction ProductDeliveryBoundary (B5) processed by HMIManager
HMIManager routes user interaction to CupManager
Sequential flow from A1.1 to A1.2
Actor User interacts with MessageDisplayBoundary
User interaction MessageDisplayBoundary (A1.2) processed by HMIManager
Sequential flow from A2.1 to A2.2
Actor User interacts with MessageDisplayBoundary
User interaction MessageDisplayBoundary (A2.2) processed by HMIManager
Actor User signals SugarRequestBoundary
User interaction SugarRequestBoundary (E1) processed by HMIManager
HMIManager (E1) activates SugarSolidManager (E1.1)

Merge node for parallel flow P2
Distribution node for parallel flow P3
Merge node for parallel flow P3
